description: The main tower of Enies Lobby where the CP9 agents await the Straw Hats. Features massive steel doors and multiple floors where intense battles take place.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Destroys Steel Door with Gear 3
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses his newly developed Gear 3 technique to destroy a massive steel door at the entrance to the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: The tower's fortifications prove no match for Luffy's new power, marking his entry into the building where Robin is being held.

keyEvents.title: Multiple CP9 Battles Begin
keyEvents.description: Various battles between Straw Hats and CP9 agents unfold throughout different rooms of the tower, including Franky vs Fukurou and Chopper vs Kumadori.
keyEvents.significance: The tower serves as the primary battleground for the climactic Enies Lobby confrontations.
